thread.title: Jayne

author: Jayne
title: Jayne
text: I have purchased several games now from this site and always find good offers and discounts never had a problem usually cheaper than the more recognised sites, and just as quick for the delivery and the fact that you receive loyalty points that are quick and easy to transfer into usable immediate codes is great, I just used mine to get another Â£5 off a game i have been waiting for ages, it has just come on pre-order and cheaper than amazon's standard price on pre-order and cashback via quidco too so win win for me will be using again.
